# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(s, text_width = 10)
    # Iterate over the words in the string
    for word in split(s, " ")
        # If the length of the current word exceeds the maximum width, add a new line
        if length(word) > text_width
            println()
        end
        # Print the word and a space
        print(word * " ")
    end
end

# Example usage:
wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")
```
